description.en: Radditarium network, your new favorite autonomous yield and liquidity generation protocol. Catering to the needs of small investors often ignored by other projects, Radditarium’s trajectory in the DeFi crypto solar system will be shaped by frictionless yield farming through token redistribution, extensive technical future plans like Radditarium network IOS and Android Game, real-life impact through charitable donations and promotion, and investor input at every level. Each holder is on the team, and each holder has a Raddit to contribute.
